errors.not_type_text_channel: Channel type must be type text!
errors.hierarchy: You cannot perform this action because your role hierarchy is too low!
errors.my_hierarchy: I cannot perform this action because my role hierachy is too low!
errors.bad_input_number: A number was expected but was not received!
errors.my_channel_access_denied: I cannot perform this action because I have insufficient permissions in the channel you are targetting!
errors.cannot_punish_myself: You cannot perform this action against me!
errors.cannot_punish_yourself: You cannot perform this action against yourself!
errors.time_too_long: This duration is too long! The max duration is `10 years`!
errors.invalid_punishmentID: An invalid punishment ID was provided!
errors.cannot_punish_owner: It is impossible to perform this action against the owner!
errors.bad_duration: A duration was expected but was not received!
